valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Mon 8 Sep 2025 to 12:00 (UTC) on Tue 9 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: Low west of Bailey 978 expected northwest Iceland 986 by 0600 tomorrow. New low expected Rockall 1000 by same time

Viking.text:
Wind
Southerly or southeasterly 5 to 7, occasionally gale 8 at first, becoming variable 3 or 4.
Sea state
Very rough becoming moderate or rough, then slight or moderate later.
Weather
Rain then showers, fog patches.
Visibility
Moderate or good, occasionally very poor.

Southeasterly gale force 8 continuing

Forties.text:
Wind
In northeast, southerly or southeasterly 5 to 7, becoming variable 3 or 4. In southwest, southwesterly backing southerly, 3 to 5.
Sea state
In northeast, moderate or rough, becoming slight or moderate later. in southwest, slight or moderate.
Weather
In northeast, rain then showers. In southwest, mainly fair.
Visibility
In northeast, moderate or good, occasionally poor. In southwest, good.
